help.mainMenu_description:
Hi, I'm {client.user}! 

**Commands**
Use the menu below to select a category.
If you need more details, you can use `/help (command)`

**Links**
> [Invite me!]({invite})
> [Support server.](https://discord.gg/tqdYpp9)

lang.translateMe: Do you want to translate me? Join my Discord!

responses: Sorry, I can't answer your question.

achievement.lengthLimit: The text can't have more than 20 characters.

snipe.noMessage: No deleted message found in that channel.
snipe.noTextChannel: You must select a Text Channel!

editsnipe.noMessage: No edited message found in that channel.
editsnipe.noTextChannel: You must select a Text Channel!
